message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $16,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair, this product is worth a considerable amount more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $13,000, but that's as high as I can go.
